trans-unit.resname: OC20·7 | Gavi, Nest Warden | Card Name
OC20·7 | Gavi, Nest Warden | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may pay {0} rather than pay the cycling cost of the first card you cycle each turn. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 red and white Dinosaur Cat creature token.
trans-unit.target: You may pay {0} rather than pay the cycling cost of the first card you cycle each turn. Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 red and white Dinosaur Cat creature token.

trans-unit.resname: OC20·7 | Gavi, Nest Warden | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: When Jirina Kudro enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game. Other Humans you control get +2/+0.
trans-unit.target: When Jirina Kudro enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game. Other Humans you control get +2/+0.

trans-unit.source: "Strength is what keeps us alive. Compassion is what keeps us human."
trans-unit.target: "Strength is what keeps us alive. Compassion is what keeps us human."

trans-unit.resname: OC20·9 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Name
OC20·9 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if Kalamax, the Stormsire is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if Kalamax, the Stormsire is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.

trans-unit.resname: OC20·9 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its mood changes with the weather, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Its mood changes with the weather, and vice versa.

trans-unit.resname: OC20·10 | Kathril, Aspect Warper | Card Name
OC20·10 | Kathril, Aspect Warper | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Kathril, Aspect Warper enters the battlefield, put a flying counter on any creature you control if a creature card in your graveyard has flying. Repeat this process for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance. Then put a +1/+1 counter on Kathril for each counter put on a creature this way.
trans-unit.target: When Kathril, Aspect Warper enters the battlefield, put a flying counter on any creature you control if a creature card in your graveyard has flying. Repeat this process for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance. Then put a +1/+1 counter on Kathril for each counter put on a creature this way.

trans-unit.resname: OC20·12 | Otrimi, the Ever-Playful | Card Name
OC20·12 | Otrimi, the Ever-Playful | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Mutate {1}{B}{G}{U} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.) Trample Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target creature card with mutate from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: Mutate {1}{B}{G}{U} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own.
